{"id":801950905,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"6Â months","timestamp":1663415548,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/801950905/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"N/A","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * struct ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode *next;\n *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {\n        ListNode *ptr = l1;\n    vector<int> v1;\n    while(ptr != nullptr){\n        v1.push_back(ptr->val);\n        ptr = ptr->next;\n    }\n\n    reverse(v1.begin(),v1.end());\n    int num1 = 0;\n    for(int i:v1){\n        num1*=10;\n        num1+=i;\n    }\n\n    ptr = l2;\n    vector<int> v2;\n    while(ptr != nullptr){\n        v2.push_back(ptr->val);\n        ptr = ptr->next;\n    }\n\n    reverse(v2.begin(),v2.end());\n\n    int num2 = 0;\n    for(int i:v2){\n        num2*=10;\n        num2+=i;\n    }\n\n\n    int num = num1 + num2;\n\n    if(num==0){\n        ListNode *ln = new ListNode(0);\n        return ln;\n    }\n\n\n    ListNode *ans = new ListNode(num%10);\n    num/=10;\n\n    ListNode *last;\n    last = ans;\n\n    while(num){\n        int rem = num%10;\n        num /= 10;\n\n        ListNode *tmp = new ListNode(rem);\n        last->next = tmp;\n        last = tmp;\n    }\n    return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers","has_notes":false}
